events.name: Lets talk about Project Management!
events.description: Lets get together over a drink and share some tips and experience in dealing with challenging projects. This first meet up will be conducted in a more relaxed atmosphere so chillax! Bumped into troubles in your projects? Feel free to toss in questions and let the group give some feedback to you. If you have one topic or two that you would like to talk about, dont hesitate to bring them up as well. The meet up will follow the lean coffee structure. Everybody can suggest a topic or two, and then vote on the topic that interest them. One person can vote twice and may use all their votes on one topic. Topics get the most votes will get the spot light and will be selected for the night.
events.location: Kazbar , 25 Church Street #01-03 Capital Square 3 Singapore 049482

events.name: Book Club: Seven Languages in Seven Weeks – Clojure
events.description:
Read Seven Languages in Seven Weeks. This week we'll be covering the chapters on Clojure.  


"Just as each new spoken language can make you smarter and increase your options, each programming language increases your mental tool kit, adding new abstractions you can throw at each new problem. " How Book Club Works1. Read the chapter before you come to the meetup.2. Find something in the chapter you found interesting and maybe research it a little more.3. At the meetup, we go around the room and each person gets a chance to tell the group about the thing they found interesting.4. Group discussion and banter ensues! Book club is held at Tim & Wei's residence: 244A Tanjong Katong RdSingapore  437032Singapore Doors open at 6:30, meetup starts at 7. Bring snacks and drinks of your choice! Feel free to ask questions in the SingaporeJS gitter room: https://gitter.im/SingaporeJS/discussions
events.location: Tim & Wei's Residence, 244A Tanjong Katong Road, Singapore
